contextId.information: You can make clear the implicit information. AT: "whether by what we taught you in person or by what we wrote to you in a letter" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
contextId.quote: whether by word or by our letter

contextId.information: You can make explicit that this is Paul's prayer for the Thessalonians. AT: "I pray that the Lord of peace himself gives you ... " (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
contextId.quote: May the Lord of peace himself give you
